name: super easy baby blanket in daily wool worsted
notes:
materials
to make your own crib (throw) size blanket, you’ll need...

- 1 (2) of purl soho’s [super easy baby blanket in daily wool worsted bundles][1]. one bundle includes 7 skeins of [daily wool worsted][2], 100% superwash wool yarn. each skein of this worsted/aran-weight yarn is 164 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 1,148 (2,290) total yards required. we used the tea party, patio, and swimming hole bundles for our samples.

you’ll also need...

- us 8 (5 mm), 32- or 40-inch [circular needles][3]

gauge
18 stitches and 36 rows (18 ridges) = 4 inches in garter stitch

sizes
crib (throw)

finished dimensions: 30 inches wide x 35¾ inches long (40 inches wide x 49 inches long)

samples: we knit the crib size.

prefer to crochet this blanket instead? we’ve also designed a [crochet version][4]!


  [1]: https://www.purlsoho.com/super-easy-baby-blanket-in-daily-wool-worsted-bundle.html
  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/daily-wool-worsted.html
  [3]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet.html?collection_filter=23796
  [4]: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/crochet-super-easy-baby-blanket-in-daily-wool
